website_summaries.verdict: A great choice if you are looking for size variation in your pliers without breaking the bank.
pros: Self-locking technology makes for a slip-free design
Fine adjustment design allows pliers to be used on a variety of objects and shapes
Oil-hardened and tempered chrome vanadium electric steel adds strength and durability
cons: On the pricier side, but most buyers think the price is worth the quality

customer_reviews.title: Best grip, strength, and adjustability I've seen in a pair of hand pliers
customer_reviews.text: Lets just say that I accidentally left the larger one in this set on a truck that left the shop this winter. I tracked it down to the yard where it parked after a 15 minute search in the freezing windy cold just so I wouldnt have to wait for its replacement. These are irreplaceable when you need them. Nice and light, slim design, and strong as hell. I dont like to keep my tools spotless so I like to get things that wont fall apart after a bit and these absolutely do not dissappoint. These are wonderful. Do yourself or the mechanic in your life and get them these.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M

customer_reviews.title: Best Pliers Ever
customer_reviews.text: If you're reading this you have probably read other glowing reviews of this product. They were all true. These things are amazing. They grip like a pitbull with lockjaw and adjustments are smooth as can be. My only regret is that I didn't discover Knipex earlier on. All that profanity directed at inferior tools over the years could have been put to better use. Bad drivers, lazy contractors, people in crosswalks, and parents that bring babies to late night movie showings. The list could go on forever.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: The only tool you’ll ever need
customer_reviews.text: I do refinery work and have used a 10 inch pair for threaded pipe connections, tube fittings, nuts, bolts, all types of screws, including allen head screws/bolts that are round, even stripped out phillips screws at weird angles. These can replace your pipe wrenches, flange wrenches, box wrenches, allen keys, screw driver and of course your current set of channel locks etc...doesn’t matter if the bolt is stripped because these things grip everything. I suspect I could climb a flag pole with two 12 inch pairs of knipex. Best tool on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Jake from Wrenchington

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to tools..I don't mess around ..I always buy quality over quantity..I'll spend the money..! to get the tools that I need ..that's how i make a living and I depend on quality products.....not cheap China S%$#..!!..by far these are the best pipe pliers..I have ever bought..I have kleins..and channel lock brands at home they did the job over the years teeth are worn down they"ve grabbed a lot of rigid pipe..!! If all goes well and these pliers don"t get clipped off the job.site...I should be able to retire with this last set..The Krauts..build precision tools..I give em that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy 2 & get only 1...
customer_reviews.text: While I love these pliers, paying Veterans Sell for a SET of 2 & receiving only 1 of them for over $70 is definitely makes this an unwisely expensive purchase. I really want my 2nd pliers that I PAID for already & do NOT want to return the 1 that I received, yet that so far is the only offer they have made me... Bottom line, definitely BUY these Knipex Pliers, but NOT from Veterans Sell!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mangelsen

customer_reviews.title: Absolute necessity
customer_reviews.text: I love Knipex stuff in general. These are great little utility pliers. The locking feature saves time and your knuckles. Great grip with the deep serrations on the jaws (be careful with that- you can ruin expensive stuff).
customer_reviews.author: B-diggy

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic German quality and a very slick mechanism. I look forward to using these for many many years to come. Only negative would be that I think I may order the 12 or 16" to complete out the capabilities. But the 10" is perfect for majority of tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin & Allison Palet

customer_reviews.title: I will buy them till I stop repairing things!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many of these over the years my go to tool when things wont come off. If it fits the area its usually a successful removal of, pipe, rounded bolts & nuts, misc fittings.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This grip far better than vise grips! They are beautifully engineered, best pliers I have ever used. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable.
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal. I was skeptical that these were going to be fake Kipipex. But they are real and they work really well.
customer_reviews.author: BBA Accountancy | Midland, TX

customer_reviews.title: High end hand tools.
customer_reviews.text: If you aren’t in the market for high quality hand tools, stay away from everythingthing knipex. Ergonomics of the handles as well as the jawline and surface of the jaws is ideal for all tasks. Not the pliers to drag through the mud, but if you choose to, they will still work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: The finest pliers I've come across
customer_reviews.text: The best pliers I've own. Love the adjustment of the jaw opening and it oozes quality. The head is also small allowing you to get into small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schulman

customer_reviews.title: Best pliers ever
customer_reviews.text: The grip is so good it tears of the conduit when I am grabbing it. The 10 inch can probably handle a 2 inch pipe. Vs other 10 inch pliers only handling max 1.25 inch
customer_reviews.author: Derk

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave home without them
customer_reviews.text: I use these pliers every day - heavy duty electrical work. Absolutely the finest quality tools I have used and I carry them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Ahlgren

customer_reviews.title: They kick ass
customer_reviews.text: Don't slip like my Milwauke ones used to the small ones are super nice for running conduit very light
customer_reviews.author: Shaunh

customer_reviews.title: Love the thin profile
customer_reviews.text: Best pliers I have ever purchased. They are now my favorite. Love the thin profile and they grip very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best channel lock pliers ever
customer_reviews.text: Best channel locks I’ve ever owned. I’ve been keeping knipex in my tool bag for years and will continue to
customer_reviews.author: Jesse porter

customer_reviews.title: Once you go lock, you never go back. js
customer_reviews.text: I could not imagine using non locking pliers ever again. These grip so well too. At first I wasn’t sure I liked how slim these are but it’s never been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: b johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best. Pliers. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Own several different pliers from Irwin and other manufacturers and these are hand over fist better. Worth the money a million times over. Even the small ones the jaws can expand to like 2-3 inches. Do yourself a favor, buy the two pack at least you’ll thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Knipex rocks
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal great pliers. The bite is amazing. They never let me down
customer_reviews.author: Mike g.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, slim and light
customer_reviews.text: Grew tired of the conventional slip joint pliers, too bulky, added more weight to the tool belt, most would open up and slip between grooves when cranking down on em. Knipex makes great quality tools and their prices aren't bad when you take into account the genius behind em.
customer_reviews.author: Cristhian

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best pliers on the market.If you've never tried a pair don't waste your money on any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ddg

customer_reviews.title: These are the best pliers I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pliers I have ever used. I work in the automotive industry and they will remove most stripped bolts I come across!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Hard to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Machining is so tight that they are hard to adjust for proper fit. I've used them for a month now, and they still aren't smooth and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Good quality hands down the best tool for the job.
customer_reviews.text: You don't know quality until you use these, been in maintenance for several years these are the best....spend the money you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Best pliers I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Great pliers. Finding the slots is a little stiff at first, but after breaking them in they are as smooth as butter. Awesome gripping power. Extremely durable. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Better than channel locks
customer_reviews.text: Grip everything I put them on. Teeth are very hard so I wouldn’t use them on a fastener you want to keep pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Last pliers you will ever buy
customer_reviews.text: Best pliers on the market. My only regret is that i am unable to give it more stars
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Steinle

customer_reviews.title: they work the way they are described
customer_reviews.text: they got a better grip than my c locks liked so much I got a set of the 22" them pliers are a ok in my book
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant design!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite adjustable pliers. They feel perfect in the hand and the grip on round items is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Parker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really like my knipex pliers best set i have purchased so far.
customer_reviews.author: ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Knipex builds amazing quality. I have a bag full Knipex tools and I have never had one fail.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Will never go without a pair of these in the tool bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love these knipex. I bought a set for the house and a set for the shop.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hartley

customer_reviews.title: Need these for your toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Useful for an array of jobs already. These are great
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: They are simply the best adjustable pliers I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I was first introduced to the Knipex adjustable pliers several years ago at a trade show. I still have that original pair. They have a lighter feel in your hand than a Channel-lock brand, yet they have a phenomenal grip. They are simply the best adjustable pliers I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! If only our American manufacturers be as precise and attentive to quality.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Essential pliers
customer_reviews.text: Super versatile pliers. Carry both at all times in my tool bag. Excellent German manufacturing and have replaced all channel lock pump pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Elevator Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are great the hold in the position you put them in plus they lock on good
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Best pliers I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Used to use vise grip pliers and multiple more of brand ones nothing has lasted as long as these have. Since purchase bought 5 and 12 inch cobra along with knipex adjustable wrenches German's really know their stuff
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a professional carpenter and I carry these in my tool pouches on every job site I go to. Knipex tools are top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Good tools are not cheap and cheap tools are never good
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly never snap or slip on me .strong grip best brand out there
customer_reviews.author: Nano

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I use them professionally everyday
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I use them professionally everyday. Other brands are finally starting to copy the Knipex design but there is only one brand in my mind. Don't waste your money on anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I've used many different brands/styles of channellocks and these are by far my favorites
customer_reviews.author: Brian Williams

customer_reviews.title: My son works with an electrician. Has dropped these ...
customer_reviews.text: My son works with an electrician. Has dropped these from the top of a grain bin and it doesn't hurt them. Very durable, quality product.
customer_reviews.author: bobbibest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Easy to adjust, grips very well without slipping. No busted knuckles
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Knipex
customer_reviews.text: Knipex, I don’t think anything else needs to be said. I just wish I found them earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Botello

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Craftsman had the knockoff for 5 dollars more. No complaints except that I should have bought sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Albelo’s

customer_reviews.title: How did I live my life without these?? ...
customer_reviews.text: How did I live my life without these??? Did you know that the 7" pair will hold a 250 pound man up without slipping???
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Unruh

customer_reviews.title: Great Pliers
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this brand, he is a plumber, and these are the type of pliers he likes the most, so yes, great pliers for what he uses them for. Highly recommend if you like this type of plier,
customer_reviews.author: L. J.

product_meta.title: KNIPEX Tools - 2 Piece Cobra Pliers Set (87 01 180 & 87 01 250) (003120V01US)
product_meta.description: Made In Wuppertal-Cronenberg, Germany. In Addition To Quality, Innovation And Performance, Other Important Cornerstones Are Sustainable Actions And Value-Guided Orientation.
feature_bullets: The Number 1 Choice Of Tradesman Worldwide
Comfortable In Use And Quality Assured Design
Fit To Match The Needs In The Shop, At Home Or In The Service Field
Each Tool Is Proven And Tested For Durability And Function In Real World Use And Conditions
